definition: to murder a superior/to murder one's parent

sentences.english: And this is based on the story, the mythical story of a king who killed his father and married his mother.
sentences.chinese: 名字来自于一个故事，一则国王弑父娶母的希腊神话。

sentences.english: Thus, Teneessee Williams becomes a Bloomian Strong Poet.
sentences.chinese: 通过“弑父”，威廉斯成为性文学历史上的强诗人。

sentences.english: Killing the father was what, in Barry’s opinion, college was all about.
sentences.chinese: 在巴里看来，上大学就是为了弑父。

sentences.english: Richard III and Macbeth are also demons: they have the complex of patricide.
sentences.chinese: 理查三世和麦克白是具有弑父情结的恶魔。

sentences.english: As best I know, none of my friends has killed his father and married his mother.
sentences.chinese: 据我所知，我的朋友中没有人弑父娶母。
爸爸，什么叫做是弑父呢？

definition: to plot a rebellion/to conspire against the state
close kindred slaughter one another (idiom); internecine strife
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
rebels and traitors (idiom)/general term for scoundrel
disgraceful (of behavior that is unfilial, rebellious or otherwise in grave breach of the norms of society)
to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
